CustomField.description: To show how many days the status has been sitting in the current selection
CustomField.formula: CASE(TEXT(Status__c), "New", TODAY() - DATEVALUE(CreatedDate), "Pack Sent to LPO", TODAY() - Sent_to_LPO_date2__c, "Received from LPO", TODAY() - Received_from_LPO_date2__c, "Awaiting Workforce Verification", TODAY() - Awaiting_Workforce_Verification_Date__c, "Missing Information", TODAY() - Missing_Information_Date2__c, "Received Missing Info Back", TODAY() - Received_Missing_Info_date2__c, "Submitted to WU", TODAY() - Submitted_to_WU_date2__c, "Review WU Return",TODAY() - Review_WU_Return_Date__c, "Return from WU", TODAY() - Returned_from_WU_Date2__c, "Resubmitted to WU", TODAY() - Resubmitted_to_WU_date2__c, 0)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Shows how many days the status has been sitting in the current selection
CustomField.label: No of days in current status
